availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William W. Ireland (Boone County and Pendleton County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Boone County and Pendleton County, Kentucky, attorney. Gallatin County, Kentucky, native. Son of James Ireland and Elizabeth Oliver Ireland. Married to America J. Anderson Ireland in Boone County on August 30, 1859. Father of Sallie M. Ireland and H. D. Ireland. Law student in Boone County in 1860. Attorney in Pendleton County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eight Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boone County, Verona District, p. 466.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Falmouth, p. 411A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boone County Marriages, Film #000216817, p. 17-8.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Pendleton County, KY, June-July 1863, p. 219 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
